analysis_age: The job description’s reference to the "young/established/longstanding team" subtly implies that the team may have a mix of ages but could also inadvertently suggest a preference for younger candidates.
analysis_masculine: The phrase "Our team is made up of independent, strong, competitive with solid" has masculine leaning connotations.
text: Job Description : Get to know our Team. The GDC Data Analyst team is a young/established/longstanding team responsible for Managing GDC Report and OKRs. We make an impact by analyze and provide recommendation to Improve GDC Operation performance and deliver excellent services with our heart and integrity to become one stop solution as one Grab. Our team is made up of independent, strong, competitive with solid and support on each other with One Grab Spirit. If you are looking for this opportunity then you should join our team! Get to know the Role. We are looking for a Junior Data Analyst. We believe a successful candidate has analytical thinking, creative to seek the solution, active learning and team player but if you believe you have what it takes then we'd love to hear from you either way. This role is required because we need you to responsible to provide, analize and manage GDC Report and also manage the GDC vendors related with Queuing System and Virtual GDC. In return, you will get an opportunity to be part of Great Team. Day-to-Day Activities You provide and manage GDC and Virtual GDC Report ( daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly ) from Zendesk, Queing System, Grab Kios, GMC Onboarding and Project related with all verticals. You are responsible to analyze the data and give recommendation to achieve GDC OKRs. You are responsible to send daily reminder for Backlog Ticket, 6H Ticket report, Grab Kios progress. You are responsible to manage data GDC Headcount and GDC Team schedule include Virtual GDC to make sure the GDC Operation running well. You will manage GDC vendors such as Queing system vendor and Virtual GDC vendor. You will collaborate with GDC Leads, Grab Support Team, IT Team, GrabKiosTeam and others related functions and departments. The Must Haves Have a personality align with Grab culture and Grab 4H ( Heart, Honour, Hunger, Humility ). Minimum qualifications for the role S1 from any major. Technical Skills required for the role Ms. Excel, Ms. Power Point, Ms. Word, Gsheet, Gslide, Gdoc, Gform, have basic knowledge Trouble shooting with Computer / Laptop and System, Analytical Thinking, Communication Skills, Presentation Skills, English ). Specific experience (if any) in specific area for certain years 1 Years. Overall years of experience 1 Years.

Job Description :
Get to know our Team
The GDC Data Analyst team is a young/established/longstanding team responsible for Managing GDC Report and OKRs. We make an impact by analyze and provide recommendation to Improve GDC Operation performance and deliver excellent services with our heart and integrity to become one stop solution as one Grab. Our team is made up of independent, strong, competitive with solid and support on each other with One Grab Spirit.
If you are looking for this opportunity then you should join our team!
Get to know the Role
We are looking for a Junior Data Analyst. We believe a successful candidate has analytical thinking, creative to seek the solution, active learning and team player but if you believe you have what it takes then we'd love to hear from you either way. This role is required because we need you to responsible to provide, analize and manage GDC Report and also manage the GDC vendors related with Queuing System and Virtual GDC. In return, you will get an opportunity to be part of Great Team.
Day-to-Day Activities
  • You provide and manage GDC and Virtual GDC Report ( daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly ) from Zendesk, Queing System, Grab Kios , GMC Onboarding and Project related with all verticals.
  • You are responsible to analyze the data and give recommendation to achieve GDC OKRs.
  • You are responsible to send daily reminder for Backlog Ticket , 6H Ticket report, Grab Kios progress
  • You are responsible to manage data GDC Headcount and GDC Team schedule include Virtual GDC to make sure the GDC Operation running well.
  • You will manage GDC vendors such as Queing system vendor and Virtual GDC vendor.
  • You will collaborate with GDC Leads , Grab Support Team, IT Team, GrabKiosTeam and others related functions and departments.

The Must Haves
  • Have a personality align with Grab culture and Grab 4H ( Heart , Honour , Hunger , Humility )
  • Minimum qualifications for the role S1 from any major
  • Technical Skills required for the role Ms.Excel , Ms.Power Point, Ms.Word , Gsheet , Gslide , Gdoc , Gform, have basic knowledge Trouble shooting with Computer / Laptop and System , Analytical Thinking, Communication Skills , Presentation Skills , English )
